PHRASE.LANG: What? The Rodeo is in town and you have nothing to wear? Well pick up a pair of these chaps and you'll be ready to go. Take on that bucking bronco with the greatest of ease, or ride the bull like a pro in these colorful chaps. [#Legal]

Quoi ? Le Rodéo est arrivé en ville et vous n'avez rien à vous mettre ? Alors mettez ces jambières et vous serez prêts. Maitriser ce fougueux bronco avec la plus grande facilité, ou montez sur le taureau comme un pro dans ces jambières colorées. [#Legal]

Was? Das Rodeo ist in der Stadt, und du hast nichts anzuziehen? Hol dir ein Paar von diesen Chaps und du hast alles, was du brauchst. Nimm es mit der größten Leichtigkeit mit dem wilden Bronco auf oder reite den Stier wie ein Profi, in diesen bunten Chaps. [#Legal]

Cosa? Il Rodeo è in città e non hai niente da indossare? Bene, prendi un paio di questi gambali e sarai pronto per andare. Sali su quel cavallo selvatico con grande facilità, o cavalca il toro come un professionista con questi colori. [#Legal]

Qué? El Rodeo está en la ciudad y no tienes nada que ponerte? Bueno, coge este par de chaparreras y estarás listo para irte. Súbete al toro mecánico con máxima facilidad o monta al toro como un profesional con estas coloridas chaparreras. [#Legal]

What? The Rodeo is in town and you have nothing to wear? Well pick up a pair of these chaps and you'll be ready to go. Take on that bucking bronco with the greatest of ease, or ride the bull like a pro in these colorful chaps. [#Legal]

What? The Rodeo is in town and you have nothing to wear? Well pick up a pair of these chaps and you'll be ready to go. Take on that bucking bronco with the greatest of ease, or ride the bull like a pro in these colorful chaps. [#Legal]
